sentences.en: As speech develops, the child starts to string more words together.
sentences.cn: 随着语言能力不断发展，孩子开始把更多的词连起来说。

sentences.en: Collins gave the keynote speech (= most important speech ) .
Harry dismissed his old friend's speech as "a nine-day wonder"
sentences.cn: 哈里对老朋友的讲话不屑一顾，称之“火不了多久”。

sentences.en: He could imitate in speech or writing most of those he admired.
sentences.cn: 他能模仿大多数自己崇拜的偶像的讲话和写作风格。

sentences.en: He has to make a lot of after-dinner speeches .
sentences.cn: 他经常要发表席后演说。

sentences.en: He is not attempting necessarily to reproduce the cadence of speech.
sentences.cn: 他不想刻意重复那种讲话的语调。

sentences.en: He was so drunk that he had lost the power of speech.
sentences.cn: 他醉得太厉害，连话都说不出来了。

sentences.en: He went even further in his speech to the conference.
sentences.cn: 他在大会发言中作了更进一步的阐述。

sentences.en: His speech was difficult to understand, his signature shaky and unrecognizable.
sentences.cn: 他的演说很难听懂，他的签名颤颤巍巍地无法识别。

sentences.en: Horrigan launched into a speech about the importance of new projects.
sentences.cn: 霍里根就新项目的重要性慷慨陈词。

sentences.en: I have already spoken about the import of his speech.
sentences.cn: 有关他的讲话的含意我刚刚已经谈过了。

sentences.en: I heard him make a very eloquent speech at that dinner.
sentences.cn: 在那次晚宴上，我听到他作了一番非常有说服力的陈词。

sentences.en: I'd make fun of her dress and imitate her speech.
sentences.cn: 我会拿她的衣着开玩笑，并模仿她说话。

sentences.en: Intoxication interferes with memory and thinking, speech and coordination.
sentences.cn: 醉酒影响记忆、思考、语言与协调性。

sentences.en: Of course I'm not. It was just a figure of speech.
sentences.cn: 我当然不是，这不过是打个比方。

sentences.en: The whole world holds its breath for this speech.
sentences.cn: 整个世界都屏住呼吸等待这一讲话。

sentences.en: There is an enormous sense of mission in his speech and gesture.
sentences.cn: 他的一言一行都带着强烈的使命感。
